TextEng: "Actually, I'm just here to destroy you!"
"I don't care about the other illithid! I just want to kill you!" <StartAction>Attack the brain pool.</Start>
Text: ""다른 일리시드는 신경 안 써! 그냥 널 죽이고 싶어!"" <StartAction>뇌 웅덩이를 공격합니다.</Start>

TextEng: "What are you talking about?"
"Yes. I want you to withdraw your support of the Valsharess."
Text: "그래. 발샤레스에 대한 지원을 철회해 줬으면 해."

TextEng: "I think I'll just kill you instead."
"Can I convince the Elder Concorde to abandon the Valsharess?"
Text: "장로 합의체를 설득해서 발샤레스를 버리게 할 수 있어?"

TextEng: "Forget it. I'll just smash you into goo!"
"Okay, what do you propose, then?"
"How am I supposed to do that?"
"I'll be back after I get the mirror."
<StartAction> Don't mention the thrall revolt. </Start>
"I think it's brain smashing time!"
"I want to ask you some questions."
"If I help you, I want you to give up the thrall trade."
"What's in this for me?"
"I don't like your attitude. Time to die, brain!"
Text: "네 태도가 마음에 안 들어. 죽을 시간이야, 뇌!"

TextEng: "Here's the mirror." <StartAction>Place the mirror in the brain pool</Start>
<StartAction>Don't mention the thrall revolt.</Start>
"I should warn you - there is a thrall revolt planned."
"Why should I help the illithid become more powerful?"
Text: "왜 내가 일리시드가 더 강해지도록 도와야 하는데?"

TextEng: "I should warn you - there is a thrall revolt planned."
"Sorry - I'm going to finish what I started!"
"Why should I let you live?"
"Is this some kind of trick?"
"What are you talking about?"
"How do you know about the Valsharess?"
<StartAction>Attack the brain pool.</Start>
